actions.text: Amendment SA 244 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 47 - 53. Record Vote Number: 75.

Amendment SA 244 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Clinton. (consideration: CR S2916-2917, S2933-2934; text as modified: CR S2933-2934) To expand access to preventive health care services that reduce unintended pregnancy (including teen pregnancy), reduce the number of abortions, and improve access to women's health care.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 244 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 47 - 53. Record Vote Number: 75.
Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 244 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 47 - 53. Record Vote Number: 75.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 244 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Clinton.

purpose: To expand access to preventive health care services that reduce unintended pregnancy (including teen pregnancy), reduce the number of abortions, and improve access to women's health care.
